title: English Actor John Hurt Dies At Age 77
text:
English Actor John Hurt Dies At Age 77 "... the most gentlemanly of gentlemen ..." by Jack Davis January 28, 2017 at 1:27pm Share on Facebook 103 Tweet Email Email Print Advertisement - story continues below 
English actor John Hurt , who won Oscar nominations for roles in The Elephant Man and Midnight Express , and appeared as Garrick Ollivander in the Harry Potter series of movies, has died at the age of 77. A touching moment at #HPCelebration to remember actor John Hurt. pic.twitter.com/aKORuau81q 
— Universal Orlando (@UniversalORL) January 28, 2017 
âJohn was the most sublime of actors and the most gentlemanly of gentlemen with the greatest of hearts and the most generosity of spirit. He touched all our lives with joy and magic and it will be a strange world without him,” his widow, Anwen, said.
